column2: `` james madison joseph jones dear sir philada. october 10 1781 1 received yesterday 2d inst. 2 questions mentioned anticipated last. clause resolutions left table relating indian purchases still undetermined. 3 many attempts made bring vermont dispute issue diversity opinions prevail one side dilatory artifices employed frustrated. evidence heard proposition including within jursidiction one states debated time decision suspended. arrangement army founded g. washington 's letter passed congress genl. observations. includes recommendation states fill quotas. arrangement civil departments taken place. new medical system passed. shippen head. craig cockran forgotten. instructions relating mississippi passed entirely satisfaction. committee preparing state reasons principles stand. dr lee yet arrived. 4 military naval intelligence come hand since last except report large embarkation actually going n. york. prudent virginia neglect precautions necessary defence case object. andre hung 2d inst. submitted fate manner shewed worthy better one. coadjutor smith soon follow. hero plot said made brigadier employed predatory expedition suited genius thirst pelf. said probability october 10 1780 baseness heartily despised taken advantage resentment mixed contempt account loss darling officer. domestic controversy still sub judice. day believe certainly decide present stage. unfortunate carried court errors. propositions founded amicable separation made part bulkley pregnant ruin old lady friends could advise accede. 5 compliments presented family desired returned great sincerity. hope lady son time recovered impediment keep assembly meets returning hither soon rises. dr. sir yr affecte friend servt james madison junr ``

`` samuel huntington john adams sir philadelphia january 1. 1781 receive herewith enclosed commission minister plenipotentiary united provinces low countries instructions government important mission 1 also plan treaty states 2 likewise resolve congress relative declaration empress russia respecting protection neutral ships c. 3 proper letters credence subject mission forwarded next conveyance thought inexpedient delay present despatches account. 4 honor highest respect esteem sir obedient humble servant sam. huntington president ``

`` samuel huntington benjamin franklin sir philadelphia january 1. 1781. receive herewith enclosed letter addressed christian majesty 1 also copy information together instructions 28th november 27th december government important subject contained letter king france 2 likewise copy instructions given coll. laurens subject 3 copy resolution congress respecting declaration empress russia. 4 despatches informed colonel laurens coming france charged special commission advice influence solicit aids money articles referred instructions. probable sail america fifteen twenty days time. observe nevertheless pleasure expectation congress delay measures obtaining aids requested wait arrival mr laurens. estimate aids requested except 25,000,000 livres already received last year time ought lost forwarding aids may obtained. wisdom prudence zeal prosperity united states render unnecessary add perswasives important subject. honor highest respect esteem sir obedient humble servant saml. huntington president ``

`` samuel huntington john laurens sir philadelphia january 1. 1781. receive herewith enclosed special commission minister court versailes 1 also two letters seal addressed christian majesty copies letters information. 2 likewise instructions government subject mission 23d 27th december last copies instructions doctor franklin 28th november 27th january 1 1781 december ulto subject information 3 estimate aids requested christian majesty. 4 warmest wishes prosperity safety success attend. dear sir much esteem regard obedient humble servant sam huntington president ``

`` samuel huntington william v high serene prince january 1 1781 united states america congress assembled impressed deep sense wisdom magnanimity desirous cultivating friendship highness seven united provinces netherlands ever distinguished inviolable attachment freedom rights nations appointed honble. john adams late delegate congress state massachusetts member council state minister plenipotentiary court may give particular assurances great respect entertain highness people preside stadtholder. 1 beseech highness give entire credit everything said minister shall deliver part especially shall assure sincerity friendship regard. pray god keep highness holy protection. done philadelphia first day january year lord one thousand seven hundred eighty one fifth year independence united states america. friends sam huntington president 2 attest cha thomson secy ``

`` virginia delegates thomas jefferson sir philadelphia jany. 1st. 1781 hond. excellencys favor 1 answer concerning safest best harbor c. c. duely communicated proper channel beg leave inform endeavord improve intended design mode obtaining speedy safe conveyance cargoe comite virginia take place land carriage would hope meet yr. approbation appeard us eligible method venturd adopt without particular instructions. monsr. l_____ promised use endeavors request complied. 2 honor transmiting yr. excellency proposal baron d'arendt. 3 speaks commission charged yet seen commission powers seen mr. wm. lees written request endeavor negotiate sending arms linen c. mr. wm. lee 's promise writing succeeded shd. handsomely rewarded state virginia shd. entitled receive state twenty five louis d'ors trouble things offer yr. excellency request ignorant whole transaction except stated wait orders thereon. letter excy. genl. washington dated new windsor decr. 27th 1780 following intelligence-\ `` another embarkation taken place new york supposed consist two thousand five hundred land forces whose destination yet known fleet fell hook wednesday last.\ `` 4 conjecture destined southward indeed enemy 's political military manoeuvres seem indicate intention making vigorous effort southern states winter. sorry inform yr. excellency receive little authentic intelligence steps takeing counteract vigorous operations great measure uninformd progress made raising new army terms done establishing magazines support measures persuing cancell old money give effectual support new providing punctual final redemption specie. crisis conceive assiduous january 1 1781 application great objects necessary next completion confoederacy perhaps basis whole first importance america therefore highly importing us know measures large state considerable effects states union. honor greatest respect yr obt humble servants james madison junr. theok. bland ``

`` artemas ward joseph ward sir 1 philadelphia january 1st 1781. day received letter seventeenth ult mr. hortons enclosed shall morning take care send either mr. bradford mr. horton find lives. say seen great folks understand figure feel helm. hear true appears figuring neither profit honor. sincerely wish morals people may corrupted figurings. unaccountable gent. ladies attended upon figurings. years ago would thought extreamly wrong countenanced measure alas seam think harm. experienced change change constitution make evil become good right become wrong. fear n't practice principles pious ancestors shall miserable people people happy world come without virtuous practice morality. would great blessing people general would endeavour discontenance vice folly incourage oposite virtue. acknowledge receipt letter long time ago ought acknowledged long since mislaid able mention date. nothing news write great hurry must conclude subscribing real friend humble servant artemas ward ``

`` james duane george washington dear general philad. 2d january 1781. receivd infinite pleasure friendly favour lt col. smith. 1 shall occasion give information passages ought know already trespassed health assist new minister. got rid violent inflamation throat find extinguishd fire hour midnight. provision wished made col. smith happy account. 2 wish knew col. willet. 3 officer gallantry zeal service ought mortified retirement. young pierce wants office paymaster general.4 know merit appointment agreeable excellency. speak plainly supposed possess dignity character suitable office. sir henry clintons movements retardments embarkations debarkations keep southern friends constant fever. general greene small regular january 2 1781 force coud operate junction reinforcement cornwallis advanced body insolent little tyrant woud repent rashness. tho rejoicing safe arrival charles town never venture far home whole force verily believe thre posts exceed 2000 men including shattered corpse tarleton must broken pieces. leslie fear come time reanimate. adieu dear children 5 believe warmest affection esteem attachment obedient faithful friend servant jas. duane ``

`` samuel huntington nathanael greene sir philada january 2. 1781 favoured despatches 7th december laid congress. 1 every thing power supply wants southern army. enclosed receive resolves congress 28th 29th ulto informed approve appointment colonel carrington deputy quarter master general. 2 also enclosed information extract letter 27th ulto excellency general washington respecting embarkation new york. 3 received farther intelligence sailing destination. honor c c c s.h ``

`` samuel huntington george washington sir philadelphia january 2. 1781 excellency receive herewith enclosed act congress 29th ulto relative exchange prisoners. 1 also enclosed act 1st instant extract letter honorable john adams esquire 23d august. 2 excellency please observe subject opinion desired expediency ordering forces christian majesty new port rhode island take post virginia. plan future operations presumed concerted conjunction count de rochambeau also many circumstances incident station best able determine expediency proposed measure need inform congress thought proper make proposal opinion give entire satisfaction subject. january 2 1781 enclosed resolve respecting lt colonel wm smith hoped may prove agreable wishes particular circumstances create disatisfaction army. 3 excellency note last resolve respecting officers lately exchanged captivity far may carried execution unable determine. honor highest respect excellency 's obedient humble servant sam. huntington president p.s. honored despatches 20th 22d 27th ulto. 4 ``

`` james lovell samuel holten sir janry. 2d. 1781. days ago got sight one letters mr. gerry published jemmy rivington tho wrote novr. 20th. 1 find thro channel nature scrawl. time told aim january 2 1781 persuade colleagues keep back last rule laid assembly government delegates mass. congress wording resolve well letter date recollect convinced intent oblige 3 attend duties delegation. 2 far prevailed get gentlemen wait explanation agreed together punctual attending give voice may become culpable real intent resolve day proves wrote could much usefully employed chamber congress packet boat absolute order sailing france. paper dunlap news paper today. affectionately j.l. ms found reprinted essex institute historical collections 13 july 1876 224. 1 found. 2 see lovell holten december 19 1780 note 1. james madison edmund pendleton dear sir philada. jany 2d. 1781. yesterday 's post first failed bring line since correspondence commenced. hope owing cause concerns health. yesterday genl washington 's hand another embarkation actually departed n. york amoun ting. abt. 2500 troops. little oubt steer course preceding detachments. 1 congress great anxiety states agst. accumulating force directed principal means defence little power. much want men want subsistance arms cloathing results want money gives greatest alarm. disposition appears every thing practicable relief defence. mr. harrison writes cadiz combined fleets port including 18 ships w. indies guichen amounted 68 ships line. offers conjecture manner employed. 2 dr sir yrs sincerely j. madison junr ``

`` theodorick bland george washington dr. sr. philadelphia janry. 4th 1781 favor letter enclosed govr. jefferson came hand yesterday 10 clock. 1 immediately deliverd excelly. presidt. congress request might forwarded without loss time line expresses establishd place richmond promised shd. done hope means yr. letter govr. reach expedition answerable importance contents. mrs. bland join cordial return best wishes excellency mrs washington assured sr. interval elapsed since last honor january 4 1781 seeing smallest degree abated warm sentiments sincere esteem affection ever shall yr. excellency 's obedt. humb. sert. theok bland ``

`` committee congress nathanael greene sr philadelphia jany. 4th. 1781 inclosed extracts genl. washingtons letter 13th 27th ulto. mr. houston 's 30 ulto. news papers give information quarter worth communicating 1 except fleet new york sailed 's destination present uninformed 't said portsmouth virginia. 1500 coats vests overalls making southern army blankets also procured forwarded without loss time. hope care hitherto done may arrive safe. resolve congress 1st inst.2 foundation done department. result early possible inform. sir much esteem regard yr. obedt. servts. order committee jno. mathews chairman p.s. thank copy last letter forgot keep one. 3 ``

`` samuel huntington sir trenton jany. 8th 1781. direction committee honor inform excellency waited place yesterday expectation hearing president read received intelligence till day noon informed us letter 1 upon going town troops pensylvanian line treated every mark respect long conference board sergeants offered proposals thought reasonable midnight returned maidenhead informed straglers morning proposals general agreable troops-he respected opinion committee respecting terms immediately communicated flatter dispute soon happily terminated. british emissaries mentioned letter yesterday delivered condition returned upon demand. circumstance known us wrote yesterday. demanded last evening agreed forth coming order president read. emissaries close confinement. another invitation british january 8 1781 morning found colledge wrapt sheet lead immediately delivered general waine. every instance shown disposition return duty upon receiving compensation past services justice done respecting terms inlistments means join british upon conviction justice could obtained. positions taken demanding return emisaries many circumstances evident mean dernier resort case obtaining reasonable terms. jersey brigade large number jersey militia posted prevent joining enemy case lenient measures desired effect. since writing rec 'd dispatches president read 2 copies inclosed general waines letter papers inclosed give every information give. honor order committee respectfully yr. exc'ys obedt. servt. jno. sullivan ``

`` joseph reed sir phila. 1 jan. 8 1781. committee congress heard excellency since yesterday noon-dispatches express obtain intelligence success. wish know whether thing appears necessary respecting affair wish every thing power bring unhappy dispute favourable issue. honor much respect excellency 's obed. serv't. jno. sullivan. order committee. ms found reprinted hazard register pennsylvania 2:189. 1 sullivan wrote `` phila `` certainly intended write trenton whence wrote two committee letters date. january 8 1781 next section .. navigator ``

`` georgia delegates `` observations\ `` january 8 1781 1 observations delegates georgia. recent accounts received europe greatest reason expect new commission issue court london purpose sounding temper america upon subject pacification state georgia perhaps south-carolina regarded part american union excluded colonized england new conquest. uti possidetis also much talked europe probable basis peace report although rejected marks abhorrence descriptions men america circulates terrors pretended drawn armed neutrality. people would particularly affected operation principles ought fear every thing although justice humanity interests america friends forbid dread thing. united one cause sacrificed blood fortunes 's support therefore would unjust january 8 1781 inhuman parts union separately embrace result common efforts leave yoke bankrupt enraged tyrant. preserve states entire object alliance france interest great branch family compact make part british empire. however enter farther discussion subject sufficient shew importance question respects state leaving others speak interests. point commerce part north-america given presages importance colony state georgia. conclusion last war could scarcely called province england commencement present rapid increase 's exports scarcely equalled part world appears brown 's aggregate see page 11 2 authentic documents. principal articles exportation war rice indigo skins europe lumber horses provisions west-indies since necessities citizens liberty left every man pursue schemes source new discoveries. tobacco cultivated astonishing success men emigrated virginia. upon trial found climate soil better adapted cultivation plant virginia vegetation rapid season longer planter enabled produce two good crops year whereas one obtained virginia maryland. face earth less broken therefore soil richer although species quality otherwise superior. beginning war mr. hammond made several hogsheads field walnut hills near augusta sent london sold farthing per pound best virginia maryland although conveniences first attempt necessary well-curing plant. fact state remained uninterrupted enemy 's army two `` john mathews william livingston sir philadelphia march 6th. 1781. miss livingston 1 informed days ago letter received mention received answer march 6 1781 inclosing letter mr. dumas. extraordinary wrote first post receipt letter. 2 conveyance present ill managed means depended. one letters lately wrote southward also miscarried. public enormous expense supporting post office appears derive little benefit. however sir accident shall discourage troubling lines whenever thing turns worthy notice. preperations final ratification confederation suspended time plan finance. constitution materially changed felt little awkward new gears however got pretty well used entered business. hope new constitution prove means introducing clear perfect understanding congress states. whilst first continue confine within strict limits authority latter conceive bound sacred ties implicitly support. want hitherto proper line drawn congress states cause numberless embarrassments whilst states left ad libitum would great deal little others scarcely anything. evil consequences resulting conduct apparent. expectations highly flattered important event anticipate mind happy consequences resulting. return french fleet rhode island suppose acquainted. must course frustrate marquis 's expedition. heard southward since 10th ulto. hourly expectation express thence. received dispatches. ward inform us cornwallis retreating genl. caswell collected 4000 north carolina militia front 6000 virginians rear. looks well probably important stroke may made gets back. genls. mughlenburgh nelson laying close siege arnold portsmouth 4500 men. advanced within mile works two mortars. advanced posts within qr. mile other-but dog get away means shipping unless french fleet prevent. dr. sir perfect esteem regard yr. obedt. servt. jno. mathews ``

`` john sullivan marquis de barbe-marbois monsieur philadelphia april 4th 1781 je vous remercais tres humblement pour le bonte que vous aviez eu de corriger la lettre que je en avais fait le honneur de vous ecrire je suis beaucop encorage en trouvant qu'il n'ya pas plus de fauts comme je l'avais ecrit par memoire seulement. je vous en assure monsieur que je n'ai pas vu un dictionaire francoise depuis que je suis arriva philadelphie je suis persuade que j'apprendrai beaucoup sous les yeux d'un si habile instructeur. c'est tres malheraux monsieur que nous avons perdu le troisieme malle au post celle de la derniere semaine etoit prit au clove dans la nuit au samedi passe. ilaya continoit plusieurs lettres mon addresse les toute sont perdues et seront publies par monsieur rivington. c'est bien malheuruse d'avoir les lettres de confiance tomber entre les mains de l'ennimie je ne suis pas sans craintes que l'or de bretagne ete employe accomplir cette evenemente. le president du congres avait donne l'ordre monsr. hazard monsr. beache dienvoyer le post par la route en derriere des montagnes de nouvel jersey nouvel windsor pour passer la riviere fishkill pour continuer sa route par litchfield hartford mais ils ont continue de l'envoyer par le clove peaks april 4 1781 kill et pour passer la riviere de la par cotoyant la riviere fishkill. vous pour icy voir monsieur que sur cette route il etoit tres facile d'attrapper le malle je ne faire pas concevoir le dessein de ces messieurs en envoyant le post par cette route la ou il est toujours facile de l'attrapper en plein jour. j'ai oui dire aujourdhui que monsieur arnold est present cette cota de la baie de chesseapeak volant du farine et autres chases des habitants dit qu'il avec lui deux mille d'hommes mais je ne le crois pas nous n'avons point d'autres nouvelles. j'ai l'honneure detre avec les respects le plus sincere monsieur votre tres humble tres obeissante serviteur. jno. sullivan translation sir philadelphia april 4 1781 wish thank humbly goodness correcting letter honor write. 1 greatly encouraged finding errors written memory. assure sir seen french dictionary since arrived philadelphia persuaded shall learn much eyes capable instructor. unfortunate sir lost third mail-coach last week. taken clove night saturday last. contained many letters addressed lost published mr. rivington. 2 unfortunate confidential letters fall hands enemy afraid british gold used accomplish result. president congress ordered mr. hazard mr. bache send post route behind mountains new jersey new windsor cross river fishkill continue route litchfield hartford continued send clove peekskill cross river thence follow river fishkill. may see sir route easy capture post. conceive purpose gentlemen sending post route always easy attack broad daylight. informed today mr. arnold present side chesapeake bay taking flour things inhabitants. said 2000 men believe. news. honor sincere respect sir humble obedient servant jno. sullivan ``

`` john sullivan marquis de barbe-marbois monsieur philadelphie. ie 12 d'avril 1781 j'ai lu hier au soir la lettre qui ete publiee par mr. rivington sous le nom du general washington je ne crois pas qutelle ete ecrit par son excellence mais si elle l ete il n rien qui puisse donner la moindre inquietude aux les commandans de l'arme et d'escadre du roi il dit qu'il etoit tres malheureux que toute l'escadre francoise ne soit pas sorti d'abord avec les troupes de terre au lieu d'un vaissau de ligne et deux fregattes comme il l'avoit propose parceque si cela etoit fait dans ce tems la qu'il falloit que mr arnold avec son arme ait ete prise mais que cette petite flotte ne pouvoit rien faire sans les troupes de terre. ii arrive journellement monsieur que les plus grands militaire pensent bien differement sur le meme objet et la reussite n'est pas toujour la miellure preuve de la sagesse de leur mesures neamenoins le april 12 1781 monde en general forme son jugement selon les evenements. je crois que le general mentionne cette affaire mais non pas avec les meme expressions que sont publiee dans la gazette royal. je suis surpris que mr rivington n ait pas adjoute davantage il publiee dans une autre gazette une lettre du general au congres dans laquelle il lui demande la permission de sa retirer du service des etats unis. ii publie aussi la reponse du congres cette lettre dont ni l'une ni l'autres n'ont jamais existe. si mr rivington pouroit forger une lettre et one reponse tout entier il ne devoit point trouver beaucoup des difficultes adjouter cette du general washington tout ce quil lui etoit agreables. j'ai l'honneure detre avec la plus parfaite estime votre tres humble tres obeissante serviteur j translation sir philadelphia april 12 1781. read yesterday evening letter published mr. rivington name general washington. 1 think written excellency nothing give least uneasiness commanders army fleet king. said unfortunate entire french fleet go first land troops instead one ship line two frigates proposed done required time mr. arnold army would captured little fleet could nothing without land troops. happens every day sir greatest soldiers think differently subject success always best proof wisdom measures nevertheless world general forms judgment according results. think general mentioned affair expressions published royal gazette. surprised mr. rivington add published another gazette letter general congress asked permission withdraw service united states. published also answer congress letter neither ever existed. mr. rivington could completely forge letter answer ought find much difficulty adding general washington 's letter anything liked. honor perfect esteem humble obedient servant j ``

`` elias boudinot hannah boudinot dearest love philadelphia octr. 21 1781 sorry oblige leaving line come stage tuesday remained great anxiety dear daughter. wrote stage thursday hopes hear setting home till dr. rodgers came friday. painful separation thing seems like shortening little time yet remains us. mind rather gloomy reason many distresses friends every quarter. suppose heard sudden unexpected death friend dr. scudder. went usual see patients way met genl forman getting men together drive refugees landed shore. went together found boats pushed off-on enemy seeing coming 500 yards distance one fired piece random shot commissioned. ball entered one side nose went thro doctors head-he died 2 hours thus helpless family left destitute circumstances believe doctors attention politicks prejudicial little estate. heart bleeds widow children-but even new london 66 widows made one day. one poor woman carried corpses husband five sons. times distress indeed. may god infinite mercy make us thankfull uncounted favours us enable us stand loins girt lamps trimmed allways waiting comeing bridegroom. letter 12th genl. informd us 9th 10 trenches opened fire 28 29 cannon let loose enemy 8 10 mortars. 1 enemy 's cannon soon silenced distance abt 500 yards. second parralell formed without much annoyance brings us within 300 yards. enemy 's works much damaged several british officers many men killed-three vessels burned red hot shot. soon batteries 2d parralell opened 42 pounders would perhaps 14th thought nothing could stand. general expected lordship would make desperate sally night 12th 13th. english fleet 26 sail 5000 troops sailed friday night hook news must got genl washington evening prepared tho wind stands many days get chesapeak. october 22 1781 clinton recd letter cornwallis dated 8th intreating aid assistance importunity courtier hope late tho know battle allways strong race swift. comfort god certainly done. shall particularly hurried 2 days come sha n't time write lewis let news soon. monday morning 2 -8 oclock. three oclock morning express arrived glorious news surrender lord cornwallis whole army. god praised. wednesday last. congratulate friends. e b. 3 ``
